EVENT_REGISTRATIONS.ACCEPT_TC: I read and I agree with the event's Terms and Conditions
EVENT_REGISTRATIONS.ACCEPT_COC: I read and I agree with the event's Code of Conduct

CONFIGURATIONS.USERS_AND_REGISTRATIONS_I: Manage the users and everything related to the event registrations.
CONFIGURATIONS.EMAIL_TEMPLATES_I: Set the templates for the following notification emails
CONFIGURATIONS.CONTENTS_I: Create and organise the contents of the event.
CONFIGURATIONS.REGISTRATIONS_OPTIONS_I: Open/close the registrations and other options.
CONFIGURATIONS.REGISTRATION_FORM_I: Add, manage and remove the fields requested during the registration.
CONFIGURATIONS.EVENT_SPOTS_I: Decide the spot types available for this event.
CONFIGURATIONS.EVENT_SPOTS_II: It is adviced NOT to change the spot types in any way during the registrations.

EMAIL_TEMPLATE.HTML_I: Set an HTML template for the email to send.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.VARIABLES_ALLOWED: The template can contain the following variables:
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: Subject
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.BAD_TEMPLATE: The template seems to have some problems. Please check its correctness.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.TEST_TEMPLATE_I: A test email with the template currently active will be sent to your email address.

VARIABLES.USER: The full name of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.COUNTRY: The country of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SECTION: The section of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_TYPE: The spot type of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_ID: The spot ID (reference) of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.PRICE: The price of the spot for the user target of the notification
